description: A good supply chain involves an integrated end-to-end management of information, financial and material flows across the whole supply chain, from sources of supply through plants to customers. Given the global context in which supply chains are to be managed, there is a need to appreciate good practice in logistics operations and supply chain management. The objective is to lead students into developing correct perspectives and thinking skills needed. This module focuses on practices that aim at improving operational efficiency to enhance the competitiveness of the business.
preclusion: LI5101 Supply Chain Management Thinking and Practice
title: Supply Chain Management Practice
